origin.description: You find yourself on your way to meet a 'friend' at a BBQ. You walk down a dark hallway to a wooden door. You can hear conversation on the other side, but can't quite make it out.

knock_on_the_door.description: You knock on the door and the conversation stops. You hear someone moving towards the door.

origin.open_the_door: Don't you think you should knock first?

bbq_door_open.description: The door opens and there is a creepy, bearded man to greet you.
